Articles.Content:
KSP version 1.1.2

Game regularly crashes when I hit "Revert to Launch/VAB". Not every time, but over 50%

Mods (installed through CKAN):

[x] Science - 4.17
DMagic Orbital Science - 1.2.4
Docking Port Alignment Indicator - 6.4
EVA Transfer - 4.0
Field Experience - 1.0.3.1
Indicator Lights - 0.8
Kerbal Engineer Redux - 1.1.1.0
Kerbal Planetary Base Systems - v1.0.12
MechJeb 2 - 2.5.7.0
MechJeb and Engineer for all! - 1.2.0.0
Modular Flight Integrator - 1.1.4.0
Module Manager - 2.6.24
Procedural Fairings - v3.17
RCS Build Aid - 0.7.7-14 (manual install)
Stockalike Mining Extension - 0.93
Trajectories - v1.6.1

Log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/0k2pig0a0wepr5f/output_log.txt?dl=0
